channel.title: AEC Industry Events Feed
channel.description: Curated feed of Architecture, Engineering, and Construction industry events across the US, with Mid-Atlantic region highlights

item.title: Concrete Construction Excellence Workshop
item.description:
Specialized training on decorative concrete, structural concrete design, and quality assurance testing. Includes plant tours and demonstrations of latest concrete placement techniques.
